info.name: Deities
info.description: Deities from the Heroes of Phandalin Campaign.
info.author: Chris New

sheet.description: Anubis is the god of Mummification. In his physical form he appears as a dark-skinned human with the head of a jackal. His and thereby his follower's job is to ensure that the dead may rest in peace and that they remain that way. His secondary job is ferrying the dead to the afterlife.He is said to judge the dead to see if his the deceased heart is pure.
